channel.title: Troll box in chat cannot be highlighted
channel.description: Nothing else to say really, happened this morning. People can detect it far easier now because troll boxes can't be highlighted in chat. So people know you are either the fool or a scorned target. I'm no longer playing this game until it's fixed, it nullifies an entire class's abilities.

item.description:
Nothing else to say really, happened this morning. People can detect it far easier now because troll boxes can’t be highlighted in chat. So people know you are either the fool or a scorned target. I’m no longer playing this game until it’s fixed, it nullifies an entire class’s abilities.
